Tax::Mileage Basic mileage rate limits should be 10,000 before April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Basic mileage rate limits should still be 10,000 on April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Basic mileage rate for cars should be 40p/mile before April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Basic mileage rate for cars should now be 45p/mile on April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Basic mileage rate for motorbikes should be 24p/mile before April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Basic mileage rate for motorbikes should still be 24p/mile on April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Basic mileage rate for bicycles should be 20p/mile before April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Basic mileage rate for bicycles should still be 20p/mile on April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Additional mileage rate for cars should be 25p/mile before April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Additional mileage rate for cars should still be 25p/mile on April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Additional mileage rate for motorbikes should be 24p/mile before April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Additional mileage rate for motorbikes should still be 24p/mile on April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Additional mileage rate for bicycles should be 20p/mile before April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Additional mileage rate for bicycles should still be 20p/mile on April 6th 2011
Tax::Mileage Car engine types and sizes until 31 May 2011 should respond with 1400/1401-2000/2000 for Petrol
Tax::Mileage Car engine types and sizes until 31 May 2011 should respond with 1400/1401-2000/2000 for Diesel
Tax::Mileage Car engine types and sizes until 31 May 2011 should respond with 1400/1401-2000/2000 for LPG
Tax::Mileage Car engine types and sizes after 31 May 2011 should respond with 1400/1401-2000/2000 for Petrol
Tax::Mileage Car engine types and sizes after 31 May 2011 should respond with 1600/1601-2000/2000 for Diesel
Tax::Mileage Car engine types and sizes after 31 May 2011 should respond with 1400/1401-2000/2000 for LPG
